replies.msg:
哦，你講其他聯署，我以為剩係講香港人發起嘅

https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/responses

Preserve the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Endowment for the Humanities
The Arts and Humanities are a vital part of our cultural identity and enhance the quality of our lives. They connect us to the past, they speak to us in the present, and they are our legacy, our gift to the future. Investing in them is never a waste, and I strongly urge that both the National Endowment for the Arts and National Endowment for the Humanities continue to receive federal funding
224,569 SIGNED

A response to your petition
Thank you for sharing your support for the National Endowment for the Arts (NEA) and the National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH).

The Administration recognizes the positive effects the arts and humanities have on our communities and believe they play a vital role in developing our Nation’s youth. The Administration is committed, however, to reducing the Nation’s debt and must make tough choices. President Donald J. Trump’s budget emphasizes national security and public safety. We must do the hard work of funding critical Government functions while being mindful of the Nation’s deficit.

The Federal Government must be accountable for every expenditure it makes. With the Federal Government running deficits of hundreds of billions of dollars each year, and the national debt now at more than $20 trillion, the Administration must carefully scrutinize every taxpayer dollar we spend.

Federal funding represents a small percentage of total investment in the arts and humanities. Given that foundations and private donations admirably provide for most resources in these areas, the Administration does not prioritize funding for these agencies. My Administration will consider your support for NEH and NEA as it drafts future budget proposals.

Thank you, again, for contacting the White House.
.
